body.name: BISSELL BigGreen Commercial Stck Vac Vacuum, Green/Gray
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 mins
features: Ingenious 2-in-1 design gives you a floor stick vac and hand vac in one unit.
Two speed control with LED light indicator.
Run Time on full charge 45 minutes.
body.description: The ingenious 2-in-1 design of the battery vacuum gives you the advantage of a powerful floor vacuum with a removable handheld vac, all in one sleek, modern unit. The rechargeable two-motor system with revolving agitator brush is superior for quick pickup, cleaning on all surfaces. There's no cord to plug in or interfere with movement! The powerful suction motor and low noise fan makes for quiet cordless operation, and the battery vacuum adjusts automatically to clean any surface. Also, the bagless dirt cup means no expensive replacement bags to buy. The battery vacuum wall mount charger makes for easy storage. Detach the handheld vac to go everywhere the floor vac can't go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars What a bummer
reviews.reviewText: Having used Bissell Big Green products exclusively for over a year for my cleaning business, I was eager to try this commercial stick vacuum. Once I received it I immediately fully charged it. The next day I tried it bright and early. I'd say its weight was nice to pick it up it's very light. First on the kitchen and bathroom floors. It did well, picking up hair, crumbs, etc. The lights make it easier to see what you're about to pick up. On my rugs it did well, picking up lint and pet fur. It even tackled my carpeted bedrooms, but there it took two or more passes to pick up any lint or debris. Luckily I have a small home, because the battery that was advertised as lasting 45 minutes using low power only lasted 15-20 minutes using low power. If you put it on high power you could see the light indicators going out within five minutes. Testing this stick vacuum was really important because I clean for a living. Needless to say, I'd need at least five fully charged batteries to get this vacuum through a regular day. Using it only in rooms/areas where a larger vacuum was unnecessary or too large. I was expecting it to live up to the manufacturer's description, at least. Also, when fully extended it was still too short for me to stand up straight. I'm 5'10". Even though I was getting bummed I took it out in the field. It needed to be charged most of the day, so I had to go back to my heavy conventional vacuum. I suggested that my wife use it on some of her places. She liked it, but battery life was the biggest complaint, along with not being able to effectively pick up our a lot of pet fur from a hardwood floor, requiring multiple passes, and eventually switching back to the conventional vacuum. I really wanted to like this vacuum. Bissell makes some excellent products, but not this one. It should not be labeled as a Big Green Commercial anything. It reminds me more of a toy vacuum by Fisher Price or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars NOT GOOD SUCTION POWER !!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this vacuum for bare floors and big rugs. Have no pets so that was not an issue. I charged this vacuum as required and followed all instructions. It is quieter than most but does not have the suction power that I need. Have to go over same spot several times to get it all. Also, one other feature that I'm not happy with is that it will not lock to stand alone. I have to prop it against something if I need to stop and move say a chair to get under it. Don't like that!! I will be returning after only using several times. Tried to like it, but will be going back. Also, after fully charged, it loses power almost immediately. The description says it will last a good 45 minutes but after only using about 3-4 minutes, one bar disappeared so I know the charge would not last the full 45 minutes. I do like the concept of a swivel unit at the bottom to allow for extra movement, the light weight, the green and gray colors, and the hand-held option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hardwood floors,no problem.
reviews.reviewText: Don't have any carpet just wood and tile works great. I have 3 Bissells.
